# UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle.automatic

**Case**

The button has a style that matches other content in the button configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Button styles

- **UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle.bordered**: The button has a bordered style.
- **UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle.borderless**: The button has a borderless style.
- **UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle.borderlessTinted**: The button has a tinted, borderless style.
